content:
Yes, that is the hope. Diversifying the economy and promoting other industries could help reduce the city's reliance on the casino industry and create more opportunities for residents. Additionally, promoting tourism and entertainment could attract more visitors to the area and increase revenue for local businesses.

It will likely take time and effort to fully revitalize Atlantic City's economy, but with the right strategies and initiatives, it is possible for the city to bounce back and provide more job opportunities and economic growth for its residents.
